model.connexion

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.connexion.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to manage users by loading their information from a file and saving it to the same file

      • save

        public static void save()
        This method save the users in the user list into a file named user

      • load

        public static void load()

      • createUser

        public static void createUser(java.lang.String login,
                              java.lang.String pass)
        This method add a new user to the user list. Do nothing if a user with the same login and same password exists
        Parameters:
        login - new user's login
        pass - new user's password

      • checkUser

        public static boolean checkUser(java.lang.String login,
                                java.lang.String pass)
        This method check if a user with login and password exists in the user list
        Parameters:
        login - login to test
        pass - pass password to test
        Returns:
        true only if a user exists with the informations in parameter

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String login,
                    java.lang.String pass)
        This method return the user with the information in parameter
        Parameters:
        login - user's login
        pass - user's password
        Returns:
        the user if found, null if no

        public static void removeUser(java.lang.String login,

        This method remove a user with the informations in parameter
        Parameters:
        login - user's login
        pass - user's password

      • checkLogin

        public static boolean checkLogin(java.lang.String login)
        This method check if the login is already used by a user
        Parameters:
        login - the login to check
        Returns:
        true only if the login is used
